name: publisher-cli
description: Publisher CLI for app versions, channels, builds, and manifests

scripts.pkg:all: npm run build && pkg . --targets node20-macos-arm64,node20-macos-x64,node20-linux-x64,node20-win-x64 --out-path bin --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:macos-arm64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node20-macos-arm64 --output bin/publisher-macos-arm64 --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:macos-x64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node20-macos-x64 --output bin/publisher-macos-x64 --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:linux-x64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node20-linux-x64 --output bin/publisher-linux-x64 --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:win-x64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node20-win-x64 --output bin/publisher-win-x64.exe --compress GZip

author: Publisher CLI
